meanings: forever, for good (and all), eternally, permanently

vlive.korean: [그리고 그렇게 쩨아리의 티엠아이는 영영 알 수 없었다] 왜 그래! [And we never found out JR's TMI...] Why! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NU’EST] 우리늉 귀여워서 심야식당 지붕뿌수고 프리미엄루프탑라운지로 만들려구요❤️💘 (NU’EST talking about their TMI)
vlive.english: [And we never found out JR's TMI...] Why!

vlive.korean: 영영 헤어지는 거 아니니까요 그렇죠? We're not separating forever, right? 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - 비트콤 #65 (2018 BTOB TIME -THIS IS US- 콘서트 마지막 날 비하인드)
영영 절 보내려고. You want to send me forever. 듣기 View video C-JeS : [REPLAY] 씨제스컬쳐SHOW 특급라이브 (CJeS Culture Show)
vlive.english: You want to send me forever.

vlive.korean: 영영 안 할 거예요? Are you not going to do it for good? 듣기 View video NCT 127 : 시즈니💚127 미리덕담타임!!!
vlive.english: Are you not going to do it for good?

vlive.korean: 너희는 영영 부화하지 못해. - 오늘 끝날 때까지? you'd never hatch. - Until this ends? 듣기 View video PeekaVoo! : [REPLAY] VICTON's - 빅톤의 팬미팅라이브!
vlive.english: you'd never hatch. - Until this ends?

examples.korean: About time! After being delayed so many times, I thought we were never going to have a sequel. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 드디어! 몇 번이고 작업이 지연돼서 속편은 영영 못 볼 줄 알았어. DARAKWON
examples.english: About time! After being delayed so many times, I thought we were never going to have a sequel. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I thought he'd gone for good. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그가 영영 가 버린 줄 알았다 Neungyule
examples.english: I thought he'd gone for good. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I thought we’d lost you for good. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신을 영영 못 보는 줄 알았어요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: He has gone never to return. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 함흥차사가 되었다, 가버린 후 영영 돌아오지 않는다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: But if you fail the English test again, the last chance you can be promoted will be gone. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 하지만 영어 시험에 또 실패하면 자네가 승진할 수 있는 마지막 기회가 영영 사라지는 걸세. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: But if you fail the English test again, the last chance you can be promoted will be gone. Add to Wordbook
